name: HiveMind (GamePasta)
description:
My entry for the 2021 32bit Game Jam.

Introduction

An evil AI is slowly taking over the planet. By broadcasting an invisible fear frequency, the general population is convinced that they must join the hive for their own safety. Unfortunately joining the hive turns the unsuspecting subject into a drone. It is up to you to gain access to the hive mind and disable its broadcast.

Remember, to succeed you must remain a shadow.

This game was inspired by 32 bit era games such as Metal Gear Solid and Tenchu Stealth Assassins.

Controls
W,A,S,D to move
SHIFT to hide against a wall

I hope you enjoy :) Try and get the good ending!
